Invocation Name: hoover elementary school
Developer Terms of Use
des: Hoover School is located in the historic “uptown” area of Whittier. We are one of ten elementary schools in the Whittier City School District. Hoover School has an enrollment of 418 students in grades K-5. The school is made up of 18 general education classes. Eleven percent of the student population is classified as English Learners (EL) with Spanish being the predominant home language. Fifty percent of our students qualify to receive a free or reduced price lunch. Hoover students are 74.9% Hispanic, 19.6% White, 2.9% Asian, 1.4% African American, and 1.2% other ethnicities.
